reviewText: Understanding and living in a relationship with Jesus Christ is sometimes elusive ... we want, and many times even think we are there, existing in that wonderful light and then we find a new level of the love that heretofore was unknown to us.  Pastor Wangerine helps us to realize these potentials.
A very thoughtful way to look at prayer.

Walter Wangerin is a man of great wisdom and excellent story-telling abilities.  This DVD is a great treasure that
draws you into the topic of prayer.

I used the DVD and study questions in our church Sunday School. I used one of the ten sessions each week. We had rich discussions answering the questions and sharing our personal stories and experiences. I would highly recommend the DVD set. It will bring tears to your eyes and joy to your heart. The Four Acts of Prayer
